_enabled: Set to true to enable the module of false to disable it. Anything below here, requires enabled set to true in order to function.
_reminderDelay: This is how long the reminders are gonna take to show up to you, in-game ( in seconds).
_assistantName: This is the name that the Whispers/Reminders you get will be from. Go crazy with the name.
_reminder: This is where you put your reminder messages. Set to 0 to disable the reminder.
